attributes.action: Support Peter Heaton-Jones campaign for revamp of Elderly Care.
attributes.additional_details: We have met with several MPs. Andy Burnham, Heidi Alexander, Barbara Keeley, Ian Murray, Peter Heaton-Jones and NatalieMcGarry.
attributes.background: We are Your Voice Matters a Community Interest Company . We campaign for a massive revamp of how Care Homes are run and regulated. We demand better care for residents by better recruitment and transparency from Care Providers and accountability of Owners for poor standards in their facilities.

rejection.details: If you could start a petition which explains clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take, we could look at this again.
